meanings.definition: A place equipped for physical exercise.
meanings.sent1: I go to the gym to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: The gym has treadmills and weights for workouts.
meanings.sent3: At the gym, I sometimes pretend to lift invisible weights.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a gym, where she trained her mind daily.
meanings.sent5: The gym smelled of sweat and determination, a place of hard work.

meanings.definition: A membership-based facility for physical fitness activities.
meanings.sent1: My friend got a new membership at the gym.
meanings.sent2: The gym offers yoga classes and personal training.
meanings.sent3: When I joined the gym, they gave me a free water bottle.
meanings.sent4: The gym became her second home, a place of strength and community.
meanings.sent5: In the gym, you can see people of all ages working out together.
